kaccit agnim iva ā ānāyyam kāle saṃmanyase atithim

original: Bhk_6.66-1 na praṇāyyo janaḥ kaccin nikāyyaṃ te 'dhitiṣṭhati
analyzed: na praṇāyyaḥ janaḥ kaccit nikāyyam te adhitiṣṭhati
deva kārya vighātāya dharma drohī mahodaye
kuṇḍapāyyavatām kaccit agnicityāvatām tathā
kathābhiḥ ramase nityam upacāyyavatām śubhe
atha prakīrṇa kāḍū
vardhate te tapaḥ bhīru
vyajeṣṭhāḥ vighna nāyakān
ajaiṣīḥ
saṃprāpthāḥ vinayena vā
nā āyasyasi tapasyantī
gurūn samyak atūtuṣaḥ
yamān na udavijiṣṭhāḥ tvam
nijāya tapase a tuṣaḥ
atha ardhyam madhuparka ādyam upanīya ā ādarāt asau
arcayitvā phalaiḥ arcyau sarvatra ākhyat anāmayam
atas param kṛt adhikāraḥ
sakhyasya tava sugrīvaḥ kārakaḥ kapi nandanaḥ
drutam draṣṭāsi maithilpāḥ
sā evam uktvā tiras abhavat
nandanāni muni indrāṇām ramaṇāni vanaukasām

original: Bhk_6.72-2 vanāni bhejatur vīrau tataḥ pāmpāni rāghavau.
analyzed: vanāni bhejatuḥ vīrau tatas pāmpāni rāghavau
bhṛṅga ālī kokila kruṅbhiḥ vāśanaiḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa

original: Bhk_6.73-2 rocanair bhūṣitāṃ pampā- masmākaṃ hṛdayāvidham
analyzed: rocanaiḥ bhūṣitām pampāḥ m asmākam hṛdayāvidham

original: Bhk_6.74-1 paribhāvīṇi tārāṇāṃ paśya manthīni cetasām
analyzed: paribhāvīṇi tārāṇām paśya manthīni cetasām
udbhāsīni jalejāni dunvanti adayitam janam

original: Bhk_6.75-2 yena jātaṃ priyā'pāye kad-vadaṃ haṃsa-kokilam.
analyzed: yena jātam priyā apāye kadvadam haṃsa kokilam

original: Bhk_6.76-1 pakṣibhir vitṛdair yūnā śākhibhiḥ kusumotkiraiḥ
analyzed: pakṣibhiḥ vitṛdaiḥ yūnā śākhibhiḥ kusuma utkiraiḥ

original: Bhk_6.76-2 a-jño yo, yasya vā nā 'sti priyaḥ,
analyzed: ajñaḥ yaḥ yasya vā nā asti priyaḥ
praglaḥ bhavet na saḥ
dhvanīnām uddhamaiḥ ebhiḥ madhūnām uddhayaiḥ bhṛśam

original: Bhk_6.77-2 ājighraiḥ puṣpa-gandhānāṃ patagair glapitā vayam.
analyzed: ājighraiḥ puṣpa gandhānām patagaiḥ glapitāḥ vayam

original: Bhk_6.78-1 dhārayaiḥ kusumormīṇāṃ pārayair bādhituṃ janān
analyzed: dhārayaiḥ kusuma ūrmīṇām pārayaiḥ bādhitum janān

original: Bhk_6.78-2 śākhibhir hā hatā bhūyo hṛdayānāmudejayaiḥ
analyzed: śākhibhiḥ hā hatāḥ bhūyas hṛdayānām udejayaiḥ
duḥkhasya mādṛgbhyaḥ dhāyaiḥ āmodam uttamam

original: Bhk_6.79-2 limpairiva tanor vātaiś cetayaḥ syāj jvalo na kaḥ.
analyzed: limpaiḥ iva tanoḥ vātaiḥ cetayaḥ syāt jvalaḥ na kaḥ
avaśyāya kaṇā āsrāvāḥ cāru muktāphala tviṣaḥ
kurvanti citta saṃsrāvam calat parṇa agra saṃbhṛtāḥ

original: Bhk_6.81-1 avasāyo bhaviṣyāmi duḥkhasyā 'sya kadā nvaham,
analyzed: avasāyaḥ bhaviṣyāmi asya kadā nu aham

original: Bhk_6.81-2 na jīvasyā 'vahāro māṃ karoti sukhinaṃ yamaḥ
analyzed: na jīvasyāḥ avahāraḥ mām karoti sukhinam yamaḥ

original: Bhk_6.82-1 dahye 'haṃ madhuno lehair dāvairugrair yathā giriḥ,
analyzed: dahye aham madhunaḥ lehaiḥ dāvaiḥ ugraiḥ yathā giriḥ
na āyaḥ kaḥ atra sa
yena syām bata aham vigata jvaraḥ
samāviṣṭam graheṇa iva grāheṇa iva ā āttam arṇave

original: Bhk_6.83-2 dṛṣṭvā gṛhān smarasyeva vanā'ntān mama mānasam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā gṛhān smarasi eva vana antān mama mānasam
nartakāḥ iva śākhinaḥ
duḥsahāḥ hi parikṣiptāḥ kvaṇadbhiḥ ali gāthakaiḥ
eka hāyana sāraṅga gatī raghu kula uttamau
lavakau śatru śaktīnām ṛṣyamūkam agacchatām

original: Bhk_6.86-1 tau vāli-praṇidhī matvā sugrīvo 'cintayat kapiḥ,
analyzed: tau vāli praṇidhī matvā sugrīvaḥ acintayat kapiḥ
bandhunā vigṛhītaḥ aham bhūyāsam jīvakaḥ katham

original: Bhk_6.87-1 sa śatru-lāvau manvāno rāghavau malayaṃ girim
analyzed: sa śatru lāvau manvānaḥ rāghavau malayam girim
jagāma sa parīvāraḥ vyoma māyam iva utthitam

original: Bhk_6.88-1 śarma-daṃ mārutiṃ dūtaṃ viṣama-sthaḥ kapi-dvipam
analyzed: śarma dam mārutim dūtam viṣama sthaḥ kapi dvipam
śoka a apanudam avyagram prāyuṅkta kapi kuñjaraḥ
viśvāsa prada veṣaḥ asau pathiprajñaḥ samāhitaḥ
cittasaṃkhyaḥ jigīṣūṇām utpapāta nabhas talam
surāpaiḥ iva ghūrṇadbhiḥ śākhibhiḥ pavana āhataiḥ
ṛṣyamūkam agāt bhṛṅgaiḥ pragītam sāmagaiḥ iva

original: Bhk_6.91-1 taṃ mano-haramāgatya giriṃ varma-harau kapiḥ
analyzed: tam manoharam āgatya girim varma harau kapiḥ
vīrau sukhāḥ avocat bhikṣuḥ bhikṣā arha vigrahaḥ
balinau amūm adri indram yuvām stamberamau iva
ācakṣāthām mithas kasmāt śaṅkareṇa api durgamam

original: Bhk_6.93-1 vyāptaṃ guhā-śayaiḥ krūraiḥ kravyādbhiḥ sa-niśācaraiḥ
analyzed: vyāptam guhā āśayaiḥ krūraiḥ kravyādbhiḥ sa niśācaraiḥ
tuṅga śaila taru channam mānuṣāṇām agocaram
satva mejaya siṃha āḍhyān stanaṃdhāyasa matviṣau
katham na aḍiṃdhamān mārgān āgatau viṣama upalān

original: Bhk_6.95-1 attīrṇau vā kathaṃ bhīmāḥ saritaḥ kūlamudvahāḥ,,
analyzed: a tīrṇau vā katham bhīmāḥ saritaḥ kūlam udvahāḥ

original: Bhk_6.95-2 āsāditau kathaṃ brūtaṃ na gajaiḥ kūlamudrujaiḥ.
analyzed: āsāditau katham brūtam na gajaiḥ kūlam udru jaiḥ
rāmaḥ avocat hanūmantam āvām abhraṃliham girim
ā eva vidvan
pituḥ kāmāt pāntau alpaṃpacān munīn
amitaṃpacam īśānam sarva bhogīṇam uttamam

original: Bhk_6.97-2 āvayoḥ pitaraṃ viddhi khyātaṃ daśarthaṃ bhuvi.
analyzed: āvayoḥ pitaram viddhi khyātam daśartham bhuvi
chalena dayitā araṇyāt rakṣasā aruṃtudena naḥ
a sūryaṃpaśyayā mūrtyā hṛtā
tām mṛgayāvahe

original: Bhk_6.99-1 pratyūce māruti rāmam Ō “asti vālīti vānaraḥ“
analyzed: pratyūce māruti rāmam asti vālī iti vānaraḥ

original: Bhk_6.99-2 śamayedapi saṃgrāme yo lalāṭaṃ-tapaṃ ravim.
analyzed: śamayet api saṃgrāme yaḥ lalāṭaṃtapam ravim

original: Bhk_6.100-1 ugraṃ-paśyena sugrīvas tena bhrātā nirākṛtaḥ,
analyzed: ugraṃpaśyena sugrīvaḥ tena bhrātā nirākṛtaḥ

original: Bhk_6.100-2 tasya mitrīyato dūtaḥ saṃprāpto 'smi vaśaṃ-vadaḥ
analyzed: tasya mitrīyataḥ dūtaḥ saṃprāptaḥ asmi vaśaṃvadaḥ

original: Bhk_6.101-1 priyaṃ-vado 'pi naivā 'haṃ bruve mithyā paraṃ-tapa /,
analyzed: priyaṃvadaḥ api na evā aham bruve mithyā paraṃtapa

original: Bhk_6.101-2 sakhyā tena daśa-grīvaṃ nihantāsi dviṣaṃ-tapam.
analyzed: sakhyā tena daśagrīvam nihantāsi dviṣaṃtapam
vācaṃyamaḥ aham anṛte satyam etat bravīmi te

original: Bhk_6.102-2 ehi, sarvaṃ-sahaṃ mitraṃ sugrīvaṃ kuru vānaram.“
analyzed: ehi sarvaṃsaham mitram sugrīvam kuru vānaram
sarvaṃkaṣa yaśaḥ śākham rāma kalpatarum kapiḥ

original: Bhk_6.103-2 ādāyā' bhraṃ-kaṣaṃ prāyān malayaṃ phala-śālinam.
analyzed: ādāya bhraṃkaṣam prāyāt malayam phala śālinam
meghaṃkaram iva āyāntam ṛtum rāmam klama anvitāḥ

original: Bhk_6.104-2 dṛṣṭvā mene nasugrīvo vāli-bhānuṃ bhayaṃ-karam.
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā mene nasugrīvaḥ vāli bhānum bhayaṃkaram
sakhyam anyonyasya priyaṃkarau
kṣemaṃkarāṇi kāryāṇi paryālocayatām tatas
āśitaṃbhavam utkruṣṭam valgitam śayitam sthitam

original: Bhk_6.106-2 bahvamanyata kākutsthaḥ kapīnāṃ svecchayā kṛtam
analyzed: bahu amanyata kākutsthaḥ kapīnām sva icchayā kṛtam
tatas baliṃdama prakhyam kapi viśvaṃbharā adhipam

original: Bhk_6.107-2 sugrīvaḥ prābravīd rāmaṃ vālino yudhi vikramam
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ prābravīt rāmam vālinaḥ yudhi vikramam
vasuṃdharāyām kṛtsnāyām na asti vāli samaḥ balī
hṛdayaṃgamam etat tvām bravīmi
na parābhavam
dūra gaiḥ anta gaiḥ bāṇaiḥ bhavān ati anta gaḥ śriyaḥ
api saṃkrandanasya syāt kruddhaḥ
kim uta vālinaḥ

original: Bhk_6.110-1 vareṇa tu muner vālī saṃjāto dasyuho raṇe
analyzed: vareṇa tu muneḥ vālī saṃjātaḥ dasyu haḥ raṇe

original: Bhk_6.111-1 atipriyatvān na hi me kātaraṃ pratipadyate
analyzed: ati priya tvāt na hi me kātaram pratipadyate
cetaḥ vāli vadham rāma
kleśa apaham upasthitam
śīrṣa ghātinam āyāta marīṇām tvām vilokayan
manye aham vālinaḥ śriyam

original: Bhk_6.113-1 śatrughnān yudhi hastighno girīn kṣipyanna-kṛtrimān
analyzed: śatru ghnān yudhi hasti ghnaḥ girīn kṣipyan akṛtrimān

original: Bhk_6.113-2 śilpibhiḥ pāṇighaiḥ kruddhas tvayā jayyo 'bhyupāya-vān.
analyzed: śilpibhiḥ pāṇighaiḥ kruddhaḥ tvayā jayyaḥ abhyupāyavān
āḍhyaṃkaraṇa vikrāntaḥ mahiṣasya suradviṣaḥ
priyaṃkaraṇam indrasya duṣkaram kṛtavān vadham

original: Bhk_6.115-1 priyaṃŌbhāvukatāṃ yātas taṃ kṣipan yojanaṃ mṛtam
analyzed: priyaṃś bhāvuka tām yātaḥ tam kṣipan yojanam mṛtam

original: Bhk_6.115-2 svarge priyaṃ-bhaviṣṇuś ca krtsnaṃ śakto 'pyabādhayan“,
analyzed: svarge priyaṃbhaviṣṇuḥ ca krtsnam śaktaḥ api abādhayan

original: Bhk_6.116-1 jijñāsoḥ śaktimastrāṇāṃ rāmo nyūna-dhiyaḥ kapeḥ
analyzed: jijñāsoḥ śaktim astrāṇām rāmaḥ nyūna dhiyaḥ kapeḥ

original: Bhk_6.116-2 abhīnat pratipattyarthaṃ sapta vyoma spṛśas tarūn.
analyzed: pratipatti artham sapta vyoma spṛśaḥ tarūn

original: Bhk_6.117-2 abhyabhūn nilayaṃ bhrātuḥ sugrīvo ninadan dadhṛk.
analyzed: abhyabhūt nilayam bhrātuḥ sugrīvaḥ ninadan dadhṛṣ

original: Bhk_6.118-1 guhāyā niragād vālī siṃho mṛgamiva dyuvan
analyzed: guhāyāḥ niragāt vālī siṃhaḥ mṛgam iva dyuvan

original: Bhk_6.118-2 bhrātaraṃ yuṅ bhiyaḥ saṃkhye ghoṣeṇā ''pūrayan diśaḥ
analyzed: bhrātaram yuj bhiyaḥ saṃkhye ghoṣeṇa ā apūrayan diśaḥ

original: Bhk_6.119-1 vyāyacchamānayor mūḍho bhede sadṛśayos tayoḥ
analyzed: vyāyacchamānayoḥ mūḍhaḥ bhede sadṛśayoḥ tayoḥ
bāṇam udyatam āyaṃsīt ikṣvāku kula nandanaḥ

original: Bhk_6.120-1 ṛṣyamūkamagāt klantaḥ kapir mṛga-sadṛg drutam
analyzed: ṛṣyamūkam agāt klantaḥ kapiḥ mṛga sadṛś drutam

original: Bhk_6.121-1 kṛtvā vāli-druhaṃ rāmo mālayā sa-viśeṣaṇam.
analyzed: kṛtvā vāli druham rāmaḥ mālayā sa viśeṣaṇam

original: Bhk_6.121-2 aṅgada-svaṃ punar hantuṃ kapighnā''hvāyayad raṇe.
analyzed: aṅgada svam punar hantum kapi ghnā āhvāyayat raṇe

original: Bhk_6.122-2 vālino dūra-bhāg rāmo bāṇaṃ prāṇā'damatyajat
analyzed: vālinaḥ dūra bhāj rāmaḥ bāṇam prāṇa adam atyajat

original: Bhk_6.123-1 vālinaṃ patitaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarā ripu-ghātinam
analyzed: vālinam patitam dṛṣṭvā vānarāḥ ripu ghātinam
bāndhava ākrośinaḥ bhejuḥ anāthāḥ kakubhaḥ daśa
dhik dāśarathim iti ūcuḥ munayaḥ vana vartinaḥ

original: Bhk_6.124-2 upeyur madhu-pāyinyaḥ krośantyas taṃ kapi-striyaḥ.
analyzed: upeyuḥ madhu pāyinyaḥ krośantyaḥ tam kapi striyaḥ
rāmam uccais upālabdha śūra mānī kapi prabhuḥ
vraṇa vedanayā glāyan sādhuṃmanyam asādhu vat
mṛṣā asi tvam haviḥ yājī rāghava
chadma tāpasaḥ
anya vyāsakta ghāti tvāt brahma ghnām pāpa saṃmitaḥ

original: Bhk_6.127-1 pāpa-kṛt sukṛtāṃ madhye rājñaḥ puṇyakṛtaḥ sutaḥ
analyzed: pāpa kṛt sukṛtām madhye rājñaḥ puṇya kṛtaḥ sutaḥ
mām apāpam durācāra
kim nihatya abhidhāsyasi
agni cit soma sut rājā

original: Bhk_6.128-2 analeṣviṣṭavān kasmān na tvayā 'pekṣitaḥ pitā.
analyzed: analeṣu iṣṭavān kasmāt na tvayā apekṣitaḥ pitā
māṃsa vikrayiṇaḥ karma vyādhasya api vigarhitam

original: Bhk_6.129-2 māṃ ghnatā bhavatā 'kāri niḥṣaṅkaṃ pāpa-dṛṣvanā.
analyzed: mām ghnatā bhavatā akāri niḥṣaṅkam pāpa dṛṣvanā

original: Bhk_6.130-1 buddhipūrvaṃ dhruvan na tvā rāja-kṛtvā pitā khalam
analyzed: buddhi pūrvam dhruvam na tvā rāja kṛtvā pitā khalam
saha yudhvānam anyena yaḥ ahinaḥ mām anāgasam

original: Bhk_6.131-1 pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā ye proktāḥ kṛta-jair dvijaiḥ,
analyzed: pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ ye proktāḥ kṛta jaiḥ dvijaiḥ
kauśalyāja
śaśa ādīnām teṣām na ekaḥ api aham kapiḥ

original: Bhk_6.132-1 kathaṃ duṣṭhuḥ svayaṃ dharme prajās tvaṃ pālayiṣyasi,
analyzed: katham svayam dharme prajāḥ tvam pālayiṣyasi

original: Bhk_6.132-2 ātmā'nujasya jihreṣi saumitres tvaṃ kathaṃ na vā.
analyzed: ātma anujasya jihreṣi saumitreḥ tvam katham na vā

original: Bhk_6.133-1 manye kiṃ-jamahaṃ ghnantaṃ tvāma-kṣattriya-je raṇe
analyzed: manye kiṃjam aham ghnantam tvām a kṣattriya je raṇe
lakṣmaṇāḥ adhija
durvṛtta
prayuktam anujena naḥ
pratyūce vālinam rāmoōnā akṛtam kṛtavān aham

original: Bhk_6.134-2 yajvabhiḥ sutvabhiḥ pūvair jaradbhiś ca kapīṣvara /
analyzed: yajvabhiḥ sutvabhiḥ pūvaiḥ jaradbhiḥ ca kapīṣvara

original: Bhk_6.135-1 te hi jālair gale pāśais tiraścāmupaseduṣām
analyzed: te hi jālaiḥ gale pāśaiḥ tiraścām upaseduṣām

original: Bhk_6.135-2 ūṣuṣāṃ para-dāraiś ca sārdhaṃ nidhanamaiṣiṣuḥ.
analyzed: ūṣuṣām paradāraiḥ ca sārdham nidhanam aiṣiṣuḥ

original: Bhk_6.136-1 ahaṃ tu ṣuṣruvānŌbhrātrā striyaṃ bhuktāṃ kanīyasā
analyzed: aham tu suṣruvān ū bhrātrā striyam bhuktām kanīyasā
upeyivān anūcānaiḥ ninditaḥ tvam latāmṛga

original: Bhk_6.137-1 anvanaiṣīt tato vālī trapā-vāniva rāghavam.
analyzed: anvanaiṣīt tatas vālī trapāvān iva rāghavam

original: Bhk_6.137-2 nyakṣipac cā'ṅgadaṃ yatnāt kākutsthe tanayaṃ priyaṃ
analyzed: nyakṣipat ca aṅgadam yatnāt kākutsthe tanayam priyam

original: Bhk_6.138-1 mriyamāṇaḥ sa sugrīvaṃ proce sad-bhāvamāgataḥŌ
analyzed: mriyamāṇaḥ sa sugrīvam proce sadbhāvam āgataḥ
saṃbhāviṣyāvaḥ ekasyām abhijānāsi mātari
avasāva naga indreṣu
yat pāsyāvaḥ madhūni ca
abhijānīhi tat sarvam
bandhūnām samayaḥ hi ayam

original: Bhk_6.140-1 daivaṃ na vidadhe nūnaṃ yugapat sukhamāvayoḥ,
analyzed: daivam na vidadhe nūnam yugapad sukham āvayoḥ

original: Bhk_6.140-2 śaśvad bahūva tad duḥsthaṃ yato na” itihā 'karot.
analyzed: śaśvat tat duḥstham yatas naḥ itihā akarot

original: Bhk_6.141-1 dadau sa dayitāṃ bhrātre mālāṃ cā'gryāṃ hiraṇmayīm,
analyzed: dadau sa dayitām bhrātre mālām ca agryām hiraṇmayīm

original: Bhk_6.141-2 rājyaṃ saṃdiśya bhogāmś ca mamāra vraṇa-pīḍitaḥ
analyzed: rājyam saṃdiśya ca mamāra vraṇa pīḍitaḥ

original: Bhk_6.142-1 tasya nirvartya kartavyaṃ sugrīvo rāghavā''jñayā
analyzed: tasya nirvartya kartavyam sugrīvaḥ rāghava ājñayā

original: Bhk_6.142-2 kiṣkindhā'dri-guhāṃ gantuṃ manaḥ praṇidadhe drutam
analyzed: kiṣkindhā adri guhām gantum manaḥ praṇidadhe drutam

original: Bhk_6.143-1 nāma-grāhaṃ kapibhiraśanaiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantā- danvag-bhāvaṃ raghu-vṛṣabhayor vānarendro virājan
analyzed: nāma grāham kapibhiḥ aśanaiḥ stūyamānaḥ samantā danvak bhāvam raghu vṛṣabhayoḥ vānara indraḥ virājan

original: Bhk_6.143-2 abhyarṇe 'mbhaḥ-patana-samaye parṇalībhūta-sānuṃ kiṣkindhādriṃ nyaviśata madhu-kṣība-guñjad-dvirepham.
analyzed: abhyarṇe ambhaḥpatana samaye parṇalībhūta sānum kiṣkindhā adrim nyaviśata madhu kṣība guñjat dvirepham
bhk

original: Bhk_7.1-1 tataḥ kartā vanā''kampaṃ vavau varṣā-prabhañjanaḥ,
analyzed: tatas kartā vana ākampam vavau varṣā prabhañjanaḥ

original: Bhk_7.1-2 nabhaḥ pūrayitāraś ca samunnemuḥ payo-dharāḥ.
analyzed: nabhaḥ pūrayitāraḥ ca samunnemuḥ payodharāḥ
tarpaṇam prajaniṣṇūnām ṣasyānām amalam payaḥ

original: Bhk_7.2-2 rociṣṇavaḥ sa-visphūrjā mumucur bhinna-vad ghanāḥ
analyzed: rociṣṇavaḥ sa visphūrjāḥ mumucuḥ bhinna vat ghanāḥ
nirākariṣṇavaḥ bhānum divam vartiṣṇavaḥ abhitas
alaṃkariṣṇavaḥ bhāntaḥ taḍitvantaḥ cariṣṇavaḥ
tān vilokya asahiṣṇuḥ san

original: Bhk_7.4-2 vasan mālyavati glāsnū rāmo jiṣṇura-dhṛṣṇu-vat
analyzed: vasat mālyavati glāsnuḥ rāmaḥ jiṣṇuḥ adhṛṣṇu vat
bhramī kadamba saṃbhinnaḥ pavanaḥ śaminām api
klamitvam kurute atyartham megha śīkara śītalaḥ
saṃjvāriṇā iva manasā dhvāntam āyāsinā mayā
drohi khadyota saṃparki nayana a moṣi duḥsaham
kurvanti parisāriṇyaḥ vidyutaḥ paridevinam
abhyāghātibhiḥ āmiśrāḥ cātakaiḥ parirāṭibhiḥ
saṃsargī paridāhī iva śītaḥ api ābhāti śīkaraḥ
soḍhum ākrīḍinaḥ aśakyāḥ śikhinaḥ parivādinaḥ

original: Bhk_7.9-1 etā devānurodhinyo dveṣiṇya iva rāgiṇam
analyzed: etāḥ deva anurodhinyaḥ dveṣiṇyaḥ iva rāgiṇam
pīḍayanti janam dhārāḥ patantyaḥ anapakāriṇam
kūryāt yoginam api eṣa sphūrjāvān parimohinam
tyāginam sukha duḥkhasya parikṣepi ambhasā amṛtuḥ

original: Bhk_7.11-1 vikatthī yācate prattama-viśrambhī muhur jalam
analyzed: vikatthī yācate prattama viśrambhī muhur jalam

original: Bhk_7.11-2 parjanyaṃ cātakaḥ pakṣī nikṛntanniva mānasam.
analyzed: parjanyam cātakaḥ pakṣī nikṛntan iva mānasam
pralāpinaḥ bhaviṣyanti kadā nu ete apalāṣiṇaḥ
pramāthinaḥ viyuktānām hiṃsakāḥ pāpa dardurāḥ

original: Bhk_7.13-1 nindako rajaniṃmanyaṃ divasaṃ kleśako niśām
analyzed: nindakaḥ rajaniṃmanyam divasam kleśakaḥ niśām
prāvṛṣi anaiṣīt kākutsthaḥ kathaṃcid paridevakaḥ
atha upaśarade apaśyat krauñcānām ceṣṭanaiḥ kulaiḥ
utkaṇṭhā vardhanaiḥ śubhram ravaṇaiḥ ambaram tatam

original: Bhk_7.15-1 vilokya dyotanaṃ candraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śocano 'vadatŌ
analyzed: vilokya dyotanam candram lakṣmaṇam śocanaḥ avadatō
paśya haṃsān aravinda ōsamutsukān

original: Bhk_7.16-1 kapiś caṅkramaṇo 'dyāpi nā 'sau bhavati gardhanaḥ,
analyzed: kapiḥ caṅkramaṇaḥ adyā api nā asau bhavati gardhanaḥ

original: Bhk_7.16-2 kurvanti kopanaṃ tārā maṇḍanā gaganasya mām.
analyzed: kurvanti kopanam tārāḥ maṇḍanāḥ gaganasya mām

original: Bhk_7.17-1 nā 'vaityāpyāyitāraṃ kiṃ kamalāni raviṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: nā avaiti āpyāyitāram kim kamalāni ravim kapiḥ
dīpitāram dina ārambhe nirasta dhvānta saṃcayam
atīte varṣuke kāle
pramattaḥ sthāyukaḥ gṛhe

original: Bhk_7.18-2 gāmuko dhruvamadhvānaṃ sugrīvo vālinā gatam.
analyzed: gāmukaḥ dhruvam adhvānam sugrīvaḥ vālinā gatam

original: Bhk_7.19-1 jalpākībhiḥ sahā ''sīnaḥ strībhiḥ prajavinā tvayā
analyzed: jalpākībhiḥ saha ā āsīnaḥ strībhiḥ prajavinā tvayā
gatvā lakṣmaṇa
vaktavyaḥ jayinā niṣṭhuram vacaḥ
śaile viśrayiṇam kṣipram anādariṇam abhyamī

original: Bhk_7.20-2 nyāyaṃ paribhavī brūhi pāpama-vyathinaṃ kapim.
analyzed: nyāyam paribhavī brūhi pāpam avyathinam kapim
spṛhayālum kapim strībhyaḥ nidrālu madayālu vat

original: Bhk_7.21-2 śraddhāluṃ bhrāmaraṃ dhāruṃ sadrumadrau vada drutam.“
analyzed: śraddhālum bhrāmaram dhārum sa drumadrau vada drutam

original: Bhk_7.22-1 sṛmaro bhaṅgura-prajño gṛhītvā bhāsuraṃ dhanuḥ
analyzed: sṛmaraḥ bhaṅgura prajñaḥ gṛhītvā bhāsuram dhanuḥ

original: Bhk_7.22-2 viduro jitvaraḥ prāpa lakṣmaṇo gatvarān kapīn.
analyzed: viduraḥ jitvaraḥ prāpa lakṣmaṇaḥ gatvarān kapīn

original: Bhk_7.23-1 taṃ jāgarūkaḥ kāryeṣu dandaśūka-ripuṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: tam jāgarūkaḥ kāryeṣu dandaśūka ripum kapiḥ

original: Bhk_7.23-2 a-kampraṃ mārutir dīpraṃ namraḥ prāveśayad guhām
analyzed: akampram mārutiḥ dīpram namraḥ prāveśayat guhām
kamrābhiḥ āvṛtaḥ strībhiḥ āśaṃsuḥ kṣemam ātmanaḥ

original: Bhk_7.24-2 icchuḥ prasādaṃ praṇayan sugrīvaḥ prāvadan nṛpam.
analyzed: icchuḥ prasādam praṇayan sugrīvaḥ prāvadat nṛpam

original: Bhk_7.25-1 “ahaṃ svapnak prasādena tava vandārubhiḥ saha
analyzed: aham svapnak prasādena tava vandārubhiḥ saha
abhīruḥ avasam strībhiḥ bhāsurābhiḥ īhā īśvaraḥ

original: Bhk_7.26-1 vidyan-nāśaṃ raver bhāsaṃ vibhrājaṃ śaśa-lāñchanam
analyzed: vidyat nāśam raveḥ bhāsam vibhrājam śaśa lāñchanam
rāma pratteṣu bhogeṣu na aham ajñāsiṣam rataḥ
eṣa śoka chidaḥ vīrān prabho
samprati vānarān
dharā śaila samudrāṇām antagān prahiṇomi aham
atha niradhikāra kṛtō

original: Bhk_7.28-1 rāghavasya tataḥ kāryaṃ kārur vānara-puṅgavaḥ
analyzed: rāghavasya tatas kāryam kāruḥ vānara puṅgavaḥ
sarva vānara senānām āśu āgamanam ādiśat
vayam adya eva gacchāmaḥ rāmam draṣṭum tvarā anvitāḥ
kārakāḥ mitra kāryāṇi sītā lābhāya saḥ abravīt

original: Bhk_7.30-1 tataḥ kapīnāṃ saṃghātā harṣād rāghava-bhūtaye
analyzed: tatas kapīnām saṃghātāḥ harṣāt rāghava bhūtaye

original: Bhk_7.30-2 pūrayantaḥ samājagmur bhaya-dāyā diśo daśa.
analyzed: pūrayantaḥ samājagmuḥ bhaya dāyāḥ diśaḥ daśa
sugrīva antikam āseduḥ sādayiṣyāmaḥ iti arim
kariṣyante iva akasmāt bhuvanam nirdaśa ānanam
kartā asmi kāryam āyātaiḥ ebhiḥ iti avagamya saḥ
kākutstha pādapa chāyām sīta sparśām upāgamat

original: Bhk_7.33-1 kāryaṃ sāra-nibhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇāṃ samāgamam
analyzed: kāryam sāra nibham dṛṣṭvā vānarāṇām samāgamam

original: Bhk_7.33-2 avain nāśaṃ daśā''syasya nirvṛttamiva rāghavaḥ.
analyzed: avait nāśam daśa āsyasya nirvṛttam iva rāghavaḥ
tatas kapi samāhāra me'ka niścāyam āgatam
upādhyāya eva āyāmam sugrīvaḥ adhyāpipat diśām
sa jalā ambhoda saṃrāvam hanumantam saha aṅgadam
jāmbavam nīla sahitam cāru sandrāvam abravīt

original: Bhk_7.36-1 “yāta yūyaṃ yama-śrāyaṃ diśaṃ nāyena dikṣaṇām
analyzed: yāta yūyam yamaśrāyam diśam nāyena dikṣaṇām
vikṣāvaḥ toya viśrāvam tarjayantaḥ mahā udadheḥ
unnāya an adhigacchantaḥ pradrāvaiḥ vasudhābhṛtām
vana abhilāvān kurvantaḥ sva icchayā cāru vikramāḥ
sadā udgāra sugandhīnām phalānām alam āśitāḥ
utkāreṣu ca dhānyānām anabhīṣṭa parigrahāḥ
saṃstāvam iva śṛṇvantaḥ chandogānām mahā adhvare
śiñjitam madhu lehānām puṣpa prastāra śāyinām
ālocayantaḥ vistāram ambhasām dakṣiṇa udadheḥ
svādayantaḥ phala rasam muṣṭi saṃgrāha pīḍitam
nyāyyam yat yatra
tat kāryam paryāyeṇa a virodhibhiḥ

original: Bhk_7.41-2 niśopaśāyaḥ kartavyaḥ phaloccāyaś ca saṃhataiḥ
analyzed: niśā upaśāyaḥ kartavyaḥ phala uccāyaḥ ca saṃhataiḥ

original: Bhk_7.42-1 sītā rakṣo-nikāyeṣu stoka-kāyaiś chalena ca
analyzed: sītā rakṣaḥ nikāyeṣu stoka kāyaiḥ chalena ca
mṛgyā śatru nikāyānām vyāvahāsīm anāśritaiḥ
sāṃrāviṇam na kartavyam
yāvat na āyāti darśanam

original: Bhk_7.43-2 saṃdṛṣṭāyāṃ tu vaidehyāṃ nigrāho vo'rthavānareḥ.
analyzed: saṃdṛṣṭāyām tu vaidehyām nigrāhaḥ vaḥ arthavān areḥ
pragrāhaiḥ iva pātrāṇām anveṣyā maithilī kṛtaiḥ
jñātavyā ca iṅgitaiḥ dhyāyantī rāghava āgamam

original: Bhk_7.45-1 vedi-vat sa-parigrāhā yajñayaiḥ saṃskṛtā dvijaiḥ
analyzed: vedi vat sa parigrāhāḥ yajñayaiḥ saṃskṛtāḥ dvijaiḥ
dṛśyā māsa tamāga hnaḥ prāk anindita veśa bhṛt
nīvāra phala mūla ā aśān ṛṣīn api atiśerate

original: Bhk_7.46-2 yasya guṇā niruddrāvās tāṃ drutaṃ yāta, paśyata.
analyzed: yasya guṇāḥ niruddrāvāḥ tām drutam yāta paśyata
ucchrāyavān ghana ārāvaḥ vānaram jalada āravam

original: Bhk_7.47-2 dūrā''plāvaṃ hanū-mantaṃ rāmaḥ proce gajā''plavaḥ
analyzed: dūra āplāvam hanūmantam rāmaḥ proce gaja āplavaḥ
avagrāhe yathā vṛṣṭim prārthayante kṛṣīvalāḥ
prarthayadhvam tathā sītām
yāta sugrīva śāsanam

original: Bhk_7.49-1 vaṇik pragrāha-vān yadvat kāle carati siddhaye,
analyzed: vaṇij pragrāhavān yadvat kāle carati siddhaye
deśa apekṣāḥ tathā yūyam yātāḥ ādāya aṅgulīyakam

original: Bhk_7.50-1 abhijñānaṃ gṛhītvā te samutpetur nabhas-talam
analyzed: abhijñānam gṛhītvā te samutpetuḥ nabhaḥ talam

original: Bhk_7.50-2 vājinaḥ syandane bhānor vimukta-pragrahā iva.
analyzed: vājinaḥ syandane bhānoḥ vimukta pragrahāḥ iva
udak śata valim koṭyā
suṣeṇam pakṣimām tathā

original: Bhk_7.51-2 diśaṃ prāsthāpayad rājā vānarāṇāṃ kṛta-tvaraḥ
analyzed: diśam prāsthāpayat rājā vānarāṇām kṛta tvaraḥ

original: Bhk_7.52-1 prācīṃ tāvadbhira-vyagraḥ kapibhir vinato yayau
analyzed: prācīm tāvadbhiḥ avyagraḥ kapibhiḥ vinataḥ yayau
apragrāhaiḥ iva ādityaḥ vājibhiḥ dūra pātibhiḥ

original: Bhk_7.53-1 yayur vindhyaṃ śaran-meghaiḥ prāvāraiḥ pravarairiva
analyzed: yayuḥ vindhyam śarad meghaiḥ prāvāraiḥ pravaraiḥ iva

original: Bhk_7.53-2 pracchannaṃ māruti-praṣṭhāḥ sītāṃ draṣṭuṃ plavaṅgamāḥ
analyzed: pracchannam māruti praṣṭhāḥ sītām draṣṭum plavaṅgamāḥ
paribhāvam mṛgendrāṇām kurvantaḥ naga mūrdhasu
vindhye tigmāṃśu mārgasya ceruḥ paribhava upame
bhremuḥ śiloccayān tuṅgān utteruḥ atarān nadān

original: Bhk_7.55-2 āśaṃsavo lavaṃ śatroḥ sītāyāś ca viniścayam
analyzed: āśaṃsavaḥ lavam śatroḥ sītāyāḥ ca viniścayam
ādareṇa gamam cakruḥ viṣamesu api a saṅghasāḥ

original: Bhk_7.56-2 vyāpnuvanto diśo 'nyādān kurvantaḥ sa-vyadhān harīn.
analyzed: vyāpnuvantaḥ diśaḥ anya ādān kurvantaḥ sa vyadhān harīn
saṃceruḥ sahasāḥ kecida
svanāḥ kecid āṭiṣuḥ
saṃyāmavantaḥ yativan
nigadān apare amucan

original: Bhk_7.58-1 atha klamāda-niḥkvāṇā narāḥ kṣīṇa-paṇā iva
analyzed: atha klamāt a niḥkvāṇāḥ narāḥ kṣīṇa paṇāḥ iva

original: Bhk_7.58-2 a-madāḥ sedurekasmin nitambe nikhilā gireḥ.
analyzed: amadāḥ seduḥ ekasmin nitambe nikhilāḥ gireḥ

original: Bhk_7.59-1 tataḥ sa-saṃmadās tatra niraikṣanta patatriṇaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa saṃmadāḥ tatra niraikṣanta patatriṇaḥ
guhā dvāreṇa niryātaḥ samajena paśūn iva
vīnām upasaram dṛṣṭvā te anyonya apahavāḥ guhām
prāviśan āhava prajñāḥ āhāvam upalipsavaḥ
kurvantaḥ havam āptānām pipāsā vadha kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: Bhk_7.61-2 dvāraṃ tamo-ghana-prakhyaṃ guhāyāḥ prāviśan drutam.
analyzed: dvāram tamaḥ ghana prakhyam guhāyāḥ prāviśan drutam
tasmin antarghaṇe apaśyan praghāṇe saudhasadmanaḥ
lauha udghana ghana skandhā lalitā apaghanām striyam
sā stamba ghna padanyāsān vighana indu sama dyutiḥ
parigha uru bhujān āha hasantī svāgatam kapīn
piprāyāḥ adri guha upaghnān udghān saṃgha samāgatān

original: Bhk_7.64-2 phalair nānā-rasaiś citraiḥ svādu-śītaiś-ca vāribhiḥ
analyzed: phalaiḥ nānā rasaiḥ citraiḥ svādu śītaiḥ ca vāribhiḥ

original: Bhk_7.65-1 nighā'nigha-taru-cchanne tasmiṃs te labdhrimaiḥ phalaiḥ
analyzed: tasmin te labdhrimaiḥ phalaiḥ

original: Bhk_7.65-2 tṛptās tāṃ bhrājathu-matīṃ papracchuḥ-“kasya pūriyam.“
analyzed: tṛptāḥ tām bhrājathumatīm papracchuḥ kasya pūḥ iyam
rakṣṇam karoṣi kasmāt tvam
yatnena ā ākhyāyatām śubhe

original: Bhk_7.66-2 svapne nidhi-vadābhāti tava saṃdarśanaṃ hi naḥ.
analyzed: svapne nidhi vat ābhāti tava saṃdarśanam hi naḥ

original: Bhk_7.67-1 tato jaladhi-gambhīrān vānarān pratyavāca sāŌ
analyzed: tatas jaladhi gambhīrān vānarān pratyavāca sāō
iyam dānava rājasya pūḥ sṛṣṭiḥ viśvakarmaṇaḥ

original: Bhk_7.68-1 jihataś ca sthitiṃ bhindan dānavo'sau jala-dviṣā,
analyzed: jihataḥ ca sthitim bhindan dānavaḥ asau jaladviṣā
duhitā merusāvarṇeḥ aham nāmnā svayaṃprabhā
jūtim icchatha ced tūrṇam
kīrtim vā pātum ātmanaḥ
karomi vā bahis yūtīn
pidhadhvam pāṇibhiḥ dṛśaḥ
prajyāyatī niruddhā akṣān vidyā iva anuṣṭhita kriyān
niracikramat icchātaḥ vānarān caṅkramāvataḥ

original: Bhk_7.71-1 niṣkramya śikṣayā tasyās trapā-vanto rasā-talāt
analyzed: niṣkramya śikṣayā tasyāḥ trapāvantaḥ rasātalāt
jñātvā māsum atikrāntam vyathām avalalambire
cintāvantaḥ kathām cakruḥ upadhā bheda bhīravaḥ

original: Bhk_7.72-2 “a-kṛtvā nṛ-pateḥ kāryaṃ pūjāṃ lapsyāmahe katham.
analyzed: a kṛtvā nṛpateḥ kāryam pūjām lapsyāmahe katham
prāya upāsanayā śāntim manvānaḥ vāli saṃbhavaḥ

original: Bhk_7.73-2 yuktvā yogaṃ sthitaḥ śaile vivṛṇvaṃścitta-vedanām
analyzed: yuktvā yogam sthitaḥ śaile vivṛṇvan citta vedanām

original: Bhk_7.74-1 praskandikāmiva prāpto dhyātvā brūte sma jāmbavān
analyzed: praskandikām iva prāptaḥ dhyātvā brūte sma jāmbavān
dhik śālabhañjikā prakhyān viśayān kalpanā rucīn
yām kārim rāja putraḥ
ayam anutiṣṭhati tām kriyām
aham api anutiṣṭhāmi saḥ api uktvā evam upāviśat

original: Bhk_7.76-1 uvāca mārutir vṛddhe saṃnyāsinyatra vānarāt
analyzed: uvāca mārutiḥ vṛddhe saṃnyāsini atra vānarāt
aham kurve prāyopaveśikām
abhāve bhavatām yaḥ asmin jīvet
tasya astu ajīvaniḥ

original: Bhk_7.77-2 ityuktvā sarva evā 'sthur baddhvā yogā''sanāni te.
analyzed: iti uktvā sarve eva ā asthuḥ baddhvā yoga āsanāni te
akleśyam asinā agni antam kabandha vadham abhyadhuḥ

original: Bhk_7.78-2 dhiṅ naḥ prapatanaṃ ghoraṃ kledā'ntatvama-nātha-vat.
analyzed: dhik naḥ prapatanam ghoram kleda anta tvam anātha vat

original: Bhk_7.79-1 tato manda-gataḥ pakṣī teṣāṃ prāyopaveśanam
analyzed: tatas manda gataḥ pakṣī teṣām prāya upaveśanam
aśanīyam iva āśaṃsuḥ mahān āyāt aśobhanaḥ
deha vraścana tuṇḍa agram tam vilokya aśubha ākaram
pāpa gocaram ātmānam aśocan vānarāḥ muhur
kṛtvā rāghava kāryam yaḥ svara ārūḍhaḥ agni saṃskṛtaḥ
narakasya avatāraḥ ayam pratyakṣaḥ asmākam āgataḥ
aceṣṭāḥ yat iha anyāyāt anena atsyāmahe vayam
hṛdaya udaṅka saṃsthānam kṛtānta ānāya sannibham
śarīra ākhana tuṇḍa agram prāpya amum śarma durlabham
īṣat āḍhyaṅkaraḥ api eṣa na paratrā aśubha kriyā
asmān attum itas abhyeti pariglānaḥ bubhukṣayā

original: Bhk_7.85-1 saṃprāpya vānarān pakṣī jagāda madhuraṃ vacaḥŌ
analyzed: saṃprāpya vānarān pakṣī jagāda madhuram vacaḥ
ke yūyam durupasthāne manasā api adri mūrdhani
atha prakīrṇakāḥ
ātmanaḥ paridevadhve kurvantaḥ rāma saṃkathām
samāna udaryam asmākam jaṭāyum ca sthuthā ādarāt
śaṅkā dhavitra vacanam pratyūcuḥ vānarāḥ
vayam śatru lavitra iṣoḥ dūtāḥ rāmasya bhūpateḥ

original: Bhk_7.88-1 kenā 'pi dauṣkuleyena kulyāṃ māhākulīṃ priyām
analyzed: kena api dauṣkuleyena kulyām māhākulīm priyām

original: Bhk_7.88-2 hṛtāṃ māhākulīnasya tasya lipsāmahe vayam.
analyzed: hṛtām māhākulīnasya tasya lipsāmahe vayam
triṃśattamam ahar yātam matvā pratyāgama avadhim
a kṛtā arthāḥ viśīdantaḥ para lokam upāsmahe
mriyāmahe
na gacchāmaḥ kauśalyāyani vallabhām
upalambhyām apaśyantaḥ kaumārīm patatām vara

original: Bhk_7.91-1 jagāda vānarān pakṣī-“nādhyagīḍhvaṃ dhruvaṃ smṛtim
analyzed: jagāda vānarān pakṣīn ādhyagīḍhvam dhruvam smṛtim
yūyam saṃkuṭiyum yasmāt kāle asmin adhyavasyatha
na ayam udvijitum kālaḥ svāmi kāryāt bhavādṛśām

original: Bhk_7.92-2 hṛta-bhārye cyute rājyād rāmo paryutsuke bhṛśam.
analyzed: hṛta bhārye cyute rājyāt paryutsuke bhṛśam

original: Bhk_7.93-1 yatnaṃ prorṇavituṃ tūrṇaṃ diśaṃ kuruta dakṣiṇām,
analyzed: yatnam prorṇavitum tūrṇam diśam kuruta dakṣiṇām

original: Bhk_7.93-2 prorṇuvitrīṃ divas tatra purīṃ drakṣyatha kāñcanīm.
analyzed: prorṇuvitrīm divaḥ tatra purīm drakṣyatha kāñcanīm

original: Bhk_7.94-1 laṅkāṃ nāmnā girer mūrdhni rākṣasendreṇa pālitām
analyzed: laṅkām nāmnā gireḥ mūrdhni rākṣasa indreṇa pālitām

original: Bhk_7.94-2 nirjitya śakramānītā dadṛśur yāṃ sura-striyaḥ
analyzed: nirjitya śakram ānītāḥ dadṛśuḥ yām sura striyaḥ
babhūva yā adhi śaila indram mṛditvā iva indra gocaram

original: Bhk_7.95-2 kuṣitvā jagatāṃ sāraṃ saikā śaṅke kṛtā bhuvi.
Bhk_7.96-1 a-mṛḍitvā sahasrā'kṣaṃ kliśitvā kauśalair nijaiḥ
analyzed: a mṛḍitvā sahasrā akṣam kliśitvā kauśalaiḥ nijaiḥ

original: Bhk_7.96-2 uditvā 'laṃ ciraṃ yatnāt saikā dhātrā vinirmitā.
analyzed: uditvā alam ciram yatnāt sā ekā dhātrā vinirmitā

original: Bhk_7.97-1 muṣitvā dhana-daṃ pāpo yāṃ gṛhītvā ''vasad dviṣan,
analyzed: muṣitvā dhanadam pāpaḥ yām gṛhītvā āvasat dviṣan

original: Bhk_7.97-2 tāṃ ruditveva śakreṇa yāta laṅkāmupekṣitām.
analyzed: tām ruditvā iva śakreṇa yāta laṅkām upekṣitām
viditvā śaktim ātmīyām rāvaṇam vijighṛkṣavaḥ

original: Bhk_7.98-2 uktaṃ pipṛcchiṣūṇāṃ vo mā sma bhūta suṣupsavaḥ.
analyzed: uktam pipṛcchiṣūṇām vaḥ mā sma bhūta suṣupsavaḥ
nā a vividiṣum bhyeti sampad rurudiṣum naram

original: Bhk_7.99-2 kiṃ mumuṣiṣu-vad yāta dviṣo nā 'pacikīrṣayā.
analyzed: kim mumuṣiṣu vat yāta dviṣaḥ naḥ apacikīrṣayā
bubhutsavaḥ drutam sītām bhutsīdhvam
prabravīmi vaḥ

original: Bhk_7.100-2 mā ca bhuddhvaṃ mṛṣoktaṃ naḥ,
analyzed: mā ca bhuddhvam mṛṣā uktam naḥ
kṛṣīḍhvam svāmine hitam
samagadhvam puras śatroḥ
modayadhvam raghūttamam
na upāyadhvam bhayam
sītām na upāyaṃsta daśānanaḥ

original: Bhk_7.102-1 tataḥ prāsthiṣatā 'drīndraṃ mahendraṃ vānarā drutam
analyzed: tatas prāsthiṣata adri indram mahā indram vānarāḥ drutam
sarve kilakilāyantaḥ
dhairyam ca ādhiṣatā adhikam

original: Bhk_7.103-1 nikuñje tasya vartitvā ramye prakṣveditāḥ param
analyzed: nikuñje tasya vartitvā ramye prakṣveditāḥ param
maṇi ratna adhiśayitam pratyudaikṣanta toyadhim
amarṣitam iva ghnantam taṭa adrīn malila ūrmibhiḥ

original: Bhk_7.104-2 śriyā samagraṃ dyutitaṃ madeneva praloṭhitam
analyzed: śriyā samagram dyutitam madena iva praloṭhitam

original: Bhk_7.105-1 pūtaṃ śītair nabhasvadbhir granthitveva sthitaṃ rucaḥ
analyzed: pūtam śītaiḥ nabhasvadbhiḥ granthitvā iva sthitam rucaḥ

original: Bhk_7.105-2 gumphitveva nirasyantaṃ taraṅgān sarvato muhuḥ
analyzed: gumphitvā iva nirasyantam taraṅgān sarvatas muhur
vañcitvā api ambaram dūram svasmin tiṣṭhantam ātmani

original: Bhk_7.106-2 tṛṣitvevā 'niśaṃ svādu pibantaṃ saritāṃ payaḥ
analyzed: tṛṣitvā iva aniśam svādu pibantam saritām payaḥ

original: Bhk_7.107-1 dyutitvā śaśinā naktaṃ raśmibhiḥ parivardhitam
analyzed: dyutitvā śaśinā naktam raśmibhiḥ parivardhitam
meroḥ jetum iva ābhogam uccais didyotiṣum muhur

original: Bhk_7.108-1 vilokya saliloccayānadhi-samudramabhraṃlihān bhraman-makara bhīṣaṇaṃ samadhigamya cā 'dhaḥ payaḥ
analyzed: vilokya saliloccayān adhi samudram abhraṃlihān bhramat makara bhīṣaṇam samadhigamya ca adhas payaḥ

original: Bhk_7.108-2 gamā''gama-sahaṃ drutaṃ kapi-vṛṣāḥ paripraiṣayan gajendra-guru-vikramaṃ taru-mṛgottamaṃ mārutim.
analyzed: gama āgama saham drutam kapi vṛṣāḥ paripraiṣayan gaja indra guru vikramam taru mṛga uttamam mārutim
bhk
tatas vyoma hanūmān uru vigrahaḥ
atyaśerata tad vegam na suparṇāḥ arka mārutāḥ
abhāyata yathā arkeṇa su prātena śarad mukhe

original: Bhk_8.2-2 gamyamānaṃ na tenā''sīdagataṃ krāmatā puraḥ.
analyzed: gamyamānam na tena āsīt agatam krāmatā puras
viyati vyatyatanvātām mūrtī hari payonidhī
vyatyaitām ca uttamam mārgam arka indra indu niṣevitam

original: Bhk_8.4-1 vyatijigye samudro'pi na dhairyaṃ tasya gacchataḥ
analyzed: vyatijigye samudraḥ api na dhairyam tasya gacchataḥ

original: Bhk_8.4-2 vyatyagacchan na ca gataṃ pracaṇḍo'pi prabhañjanaḥ.
analyzed: vyatyagacchat na ca gatam pracaṇḍaḥ api prabhañjanaḥ
vyatighnantīm vyatighnantām rākṣasīm

original: Bhk_8.5-2 jaghānā''viśya vadanaṃ niryāt bhittvodaraṃ drutam
analyzed: jaghāna āviśya vadanam niryāt bhittvā udaram drutam

original: Bhk_8.6-1 anyonyaṃ sma vyatiyutaḥ śabdān śabdais tu bhīṣaṇān
analyzed: anyonyam sma vyatiyutaḥ śabdān śabdaiḥ tu bhīṣaṇān

original: Bhk_8.6-2 udanvāṃś cāniloddhūto mriyamāṇā ca rākṣasī.
analyzed: udanvān ca anila uddhūtaḥ mriyamāṇā ca rākṣasī
nyavikṣata mahā grāha saṃkulam makara ālayam

original: Bhk_8.7-2 saikā bahūnāṃ kurvāṇā nakrāṇāṃ svā''śitambhavam
analyzed: sā ekā bahūnām kurvāṇā nakrāṇām sva āśitambhavam
kṛtena upakṛtam vāyoḥ parikrīṇānam utthitam

original: Bhk_8.8-2 pitrā saṃrakṣitaṃ śakrāt sa mainākā'drimaikṣata.
analyzed: pitrā saṃrakṣitam śakrāt sa maināka adrim aikṣata
kham parājayamānaḥ asau unnatya
jagāda adriḥ vijeṣīṣṭhāḥ mayi viśramya vairiṇam
phalāni ādatsva citrāṇi
parikrīḍasva sānuṣu
sādhu anukrīḍamānāni paśya vṛndāni pakṣiṇām
kṣaṇam bhadrā avatiṣṭhasva
tatas prasthāsyase punar

original: Bhk_8.11-2 na tat saṃsthāsyate kāryaṃ dakṣeṇorīkṛtaṃ tvayā.
analyzed: na tat saṃsthāsyate kāryam dakṣeṇa urīkṛtam tvayā

original: Bhk_8.12-1 tvayi nas tiṣṭhate prītis tubhyaṃ tiṣṭhāmahe vayam,
analyzed: tvayi naḥ tiṣṭhate prītiḥ tubhyam tiṣṭhāmahe vayam

original: Bhk_8.12-2 uttiṣṭhamānaṃ mitrā'rthe kas tvāṃ na bahu manyate.
analyzed: uttiṣṭhamānam mitra arthe kaḥ tvām na bahu manyate

original: Bhk_8.13-1 ye sūryamupatiṣṭhante mantraiḥ saṃdhyā-trayaṃ dvijāḥ,
analyzed: ye sūryam upatiṣṭhante mantraiḥ saṃdhyā trayam dvijāḥ

original: Bhk_8.13-2 rakṣobhis tāpitās te'pi siddhiṃ dyāyanti te'dhunā.
analyzed: rakṣobhiḥ tāpitāḥ te api siddhim te adhunā
avyagram upatiṣṭhasva vīra
vāyoḥ aham suhṛd
raviḥ vitapate atyartham āśvasya mayi gamyatām
tīvram uttapamānaḥ ayam aśakyaḥ soḍhum ātapaḥ

original: Bhk_8.15-2 āghnāna iva saṃdīptairalātaiḥ sarvato muhuḥ.
analyzed: āghnānaḥ iva saṃdīptaiḥ alātaiḥ sarvatas muhur
saṃśṛṇuṣva kape
matkaiḥ saṃgacchasva vanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
samāranta abhīṣṭāḥ saṃkalpāḥ tvayi upāgate
ke na saṃvidrate
vāyoḥ mainākā adriḥ yathā sakhā
yatnāt upāhvaye pratītaḥ
saṃhvayasva vivakṣitam
dyām iva āvayamānam tam avocat bhūdharam kapiḥ
upakurvantam atyartham prakurvāṇaḥ anujīvi vat
kula bhāryām prakurvāṇam aham draṣṭum daśānanam
yāmi tvarāvān śaila indra
mā kasyacid upaskṛthāḥ

original: Bhk_8.20-1 yo'pacakre vanāt sītāmadhicakre na yaṃ hariḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ apacakre vanāt sītām adhicakre na yam hariḥ

original: Bhk_8.20-2 vikurvāṇaḥ svarānadya balaṃ tasya nihanmyaham.
analyzed: vikurvāṇaḥ svarān adya balam tasya nihanmi aham

original: Bhk_8.21-1 vikurve nagare tasya pāpasyā 'dya raghu-dviṣaḥ,
analyzed: vikurve nagare tasya pāpasyāḥ adya raghudviṣaḥ

original: Bhk_8.21-2 vineṣye vā priyān prāṇānudāneṣye'thavā yaśaḥ.
analyzed: vineṣye vā priyān prāṇān udāneṣye athavā yaśaḥ
vineṣye krodham athavā kramamāṇaḥ ari saṃsadi

original: Bhk_8.22-2 ityuktvā khe parākraṃsta tūrṇaṃ sūnur nabhasvataḥ.
analyzed: iti uktvā khe parākraṃsta tūrṇam sūnuḥ nabhasvataḥ
parīkṣitum upākraṃsta rākṣasī tasya vikramam
divam ākramamāṇā iva ketu tārā bhaya pradā
jale vikramamāṇāyāḥ hanūmān śata yojanam
āsyam praviśya nirayāt aṇūbhūyāḥ a pracetitaḥ
draṣṭum prakramamāṇaḥ asau sītām ambhonidheḥ taṭam
upākraṃstā ākulam ghoraiḥ kramamāṇaiḥ niśācaraiḥ
ātmānam apajānānaḥ śaśa mātraḥ anayat dinam

original: Bhk_8.26-2 jñāsye rātrāviti prājñaḥ pratyajñāsta kriyā-paṭuḥ.
analyzed: jñāsye rātrau iti prājñaḥ pratyajñāsta kriyā paṭuḥ
saṃjānānān paridharan rāvaṇa anucarān bahūn
laṅkām samāviśat rātrau vadamānaḥ ari durgamām
kiṃcid na upāvadiṣṭā asau
kenacid vyavadiṣṭa na

original: Bhk_8.28-2 śṛṇvan saṃpravadamānād rāvaṇasya guṇān janāt.
analyzed: śṛṇvan saṃpravadamānāt rāvaṇasya guṇān janāt
jalpita utkruṣṭa saṃgīta pranṛtta smita valgitaiḥ
ghoṣasya anvavadiṣṭā iva laṅkā putākratoḥ puras

original: Bhk_8.30-1 aid vipravadamānais tāṃ saṃyuktāṃ brahma-rākṣasaiḥ
analyzed: ait vipravadamānaiḥ tām saṃyuktām brahmarākṣasaiḥ
tathā avagiramāṇaiḥ ca piśācaiḥ māmsa śoṇitam

original: Bhk_8.31-1 yathā-svaṃ saṃgirante sma goṣṭhīṣu svāmino guṇān,
analyzed: yathāsvam saṃgirante sma goṣṭhīṣu svāminaḥ guṇān

original: Bhk_8.31-2 pāna-śauṇḍāḥ pathaḥ kṣībā vṛndairudacaranta ca.
analyzed: pāna śauṇḍāḥ pathaḥ kṣībāḥ vṛndaiḥ udacaranta ca
yānaiḥ anye kuñjara aśva ratha ādibhiḥ
saṃprāyacchanta bandībhiḥ anye puṣpa phalam śubham

original: Bhk_8.33-1 kopāt kāścit priyaiḥ prattamupāyaṃsata nā''savam,
analyzed: kopāt kāścid priyaiḥ prattam upāyaṃsata na āsavam
prema jijñāsamānābhyaḥ tābhyaḥ aśapsata kāminaḥ
prādidṛkṣata naḥ nṛtyam
nā aśuśrūṣata gāyanān
rāmam susmūrṣamāṇaḥ asau kapiḥ viraha duḥkhitam
anujijñāsatā iva atha laṅkā darṣanam indunā
pūrvasyām diśi udaiyata

original: Bhk_8.36-1 āśuśrūṣan sa maithilyā vārtāṃ harmyeṣu rakṣasām
analyzed: āśuśrūṣan sa maithilyāḥ vārtām harmyeṣu rakṣasām
śīyamāna andhakāreṣu samacārīt aśaṅkitaḥ
śata sāhasram ārakṣam madhya gam rakṣasām kapiḥ

original: Bhk_8.37-2 dadarśa, yaṃ kṛtānto'pi mriyetā''sādya bhīṣaṇam,
analyzed: dadarśa yam kṛtāntaḥ api mriyeta āsādya bhīṣaṇam
adhyāsisiṣamāṇe atha viyat madhyam niśākare
kāsāṃcakre purī sa oghaiḥ atīva udbhāsibhiḥ sitaiḥ
indum caṣaka saṃkrāntam upāyuṅkta yathā amṛtam

original: Bhk_8.39-2 payuñjānaḥ priyā vācaḥ samājā'nurato janaḥ
analyzed: priyāḥ vācaḥ samāja anurataḥ janaḥ
saṃkṣṇuvānaḥ iva utkaṇṭhām upābhuṅkta surā malam

original: Bhk_8.40-2 jyotsnāyāṃ vigalan-mānas taruṇo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaḥ
analyzed: jyotsnāyām vigalat mānaḥ taruṇaḥ rakṣasām gaṇaḥ
madhu apāyayata svaccham sa utpalam dayitā antike
ātmānam surata ābhoga viśrambha utpādanam muhur

original: Bhk_8.42-1 abhīṣayanta ye śakraṃ rākṣasā raṇa-paṇḍitāḥ
analyzed: abhīṣayanta ye śakram rākṣasāḥ raṇa paṇḍitāḥ

original: Bhk_8.42-2 avismāpayamānas tān kapiroṭīd gṛhād gṛham,
analyzed: a vismāpayamānaḥ tān kapi roṭīt gṛhāt gṛham

original: Bhk_8.43-1 sītāṃ didṛkṣuḥ pracchannaḥ so 'gardhayata rākṣasān,
analyzed: sītām didṛkṣuḥ pracchannaḥ saḥ agardhayata rākṣasān

original: Bhk_8.43-2 avañcayata māyāś ca sva-māyābhir naradviṣām,
analyzed: avañcayata māyāḥ ca sva māyābhiḥ naradviṣām
apalāpayamānasya śatrūn tasya abhavat matiḥ
mithyā kārayate cāraiḥ ghoṣaṇām rākṣasa adhipaḥ
gūhamānaḥ sva māhātmyam aṭitvā mantri saṃsadaḥ
nṛbhyaḥ apavadamānasya rāvaṇasya gṛham yayau
diśaḥ dyotayamānābhiḥ divya nārībhiḥ ākulam
śriyam āyacchamānābhiḥ uttamābhiḥ anuttamām
nityam udyacchamānābhiḥ smara saṃbhoga karmasu
jānānābhiḥ alam līlā kila kiṃcit a vibhramān

original: Bhk_8.48-1 svaṃ karma kārayannāste niścinto yā jhaṣa-dhvajaḥ,
analyzed: svam karma kārayan āste niścintaḥ yā jhaṣadhvajaḥ
sva artham kārayamāṇābhiḥ yūnaḥ mada vimohitān

original: Bhk_8.49-1 kāntiṃ svāṃ vahamānābhir yajantībhiḥ sva-vigrahān
analyzed: kāntim svām vahamānābhiḥ yajantībhiḥ sva vigrahān
netraiḥ iva pibantībhiḥ paśyatām citta saṃhatīḥ

original: Bhk_8.50-1 tā hanūmān parākurvannagamat puṣpakaṃ prati
analyzed: tāḥ hanūmān parākurvan agamat puṣpakam prati
vimānam mandarasya adreḥ anukurvat iva śriyam
tasmin kailāsa saṃkāśām śiraḥ śṛṅgam bhaja drumam
abhikṣipantam aikṣiṣṭa rāvaṇam parvata śriyam
pravahantam sadā āmodam suptam parijana a anvitam
maghone parimṛṣyantam ārabhantam param smare

original: Bhk_8.53-1 vyaramat pradhanād yasmāt paritrastaḥ sahasra-dṛk,
analyzed: vyaramat pradhanāt yasmāt paritrastaḥ sahasradṛś

original: Bhk_8.53-2 kṣaṇaṃ paryaramat tasya darśanān mārutā''tmajaḥ.
analyzed: kṣaṇam paryaramat tasya darśanāt mārutā''tmajaḥ

original: Bhk_8.54-1 upāraṃsīc ca saṃpaśyan vānaras taṃ cikīrṣitāt
analyzed: upāraṃsīt ca saṃpaśyan vānaraḥ tam cikīrṣitāt
ramyam merum iva ādhūta kānanam śvasana ūrmibhiḥ

original: Bhk_8.55-1 dṛṣṭvā dayitayā sākaṃ rahībhūtaṃ daśānanam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā dayitayā sākam rahībhūtam daśānanam
nā atra sītā iti upāraṃsta durmanāḥ vāyusaṃbhavaḥ
tatas prākāram ārohat kṣapāṭān avibodhayan
na ayodhayat samarthaḥ api sītā darśana lālasaḥ
adhyāsīt
rāghavasya aham nāśayeyam katham śucam
vaidehyāḥ janayeyam vā katham ānandam uttamam

original: Bhk_8.58-1 dṛṣṭvā rāghava-kāntāṃ tāṃ drāvayiṣyāmi rākṣasān,
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā rāghava kāntām tām drāvayiṣyāmi rākṣasān

original: Bhk_8.58-2 tasyā hi darśanāt pūrvaṃ vikramaḥ kārya-nāśa-kṛt.
analyzed: tasyāḥ hi darśanāt pūrvam vikramaḥ kārya nāśa kṛt
cintayan ittham uttuṅgaiḥ prāvayantīm divam vanaiḥ
aśoka vanikām ārāt apaśyat stabaka ācitām

original: Bhk_8.60-1 tāṃ prāviśat kapi-vyāghras tarūna-calayan śanaiḥ
analyzed: tām prāviśat kapi vyāghraḥ tarūn acalayan śanais

original: Bhk_8.60-2 a-trāsayan vana-śayān suptān śākhāsu pakṣiṇaḥ.
analyzed: atrāsayan vana śayān suptān śākhāsu pakṣiṇaḥ

original: Bhk_8.61-1 avād vāyuḥ śanair yasyāṃ latāṃ nartayamāna-vat
analyzed: avāt vāyuḥ śanais yasyām latām nartayamāna vat
na āyāsayanta saṃtrastāḥ ṛtavaḥ anyonya saṃpadaḥ

na tu arocayata ā ātmānam caturaḥ vṛddhimān api

asyandan indu maṇayataḥ
vyarucan kumuda ākarāḥ
aloṭhiṣata vātena prakīrṇaḥ stabaka uccayāḥ

vitathā eva naḥ

api sthāṇum jayet rāmaḥ

asaṃprāpte daśagrīve praviṣṭaḥ aham idam vanam

analyzed: vānareṣu kapiḥ svāmī nareṣu adhipateḥ sakhā

ayam maithilī abhijñānam kākutsthasya aṅgulīyakaḥ
bhavatyā smaratā atyartham arpitaḥ sa ādaram mama
rāmasya dayamānaḥ asau adhyeti tava lakṣmaṇaḥ
upāskṛṣātām rāja indrau āgamasya iha mā trasīḥ
rāvaṇasya iha rokṣyanti kapayaḥ bhīma vikramāḥ

manyoḥ ujjāsayā ātmanaḥ

analyzed: rākṣasānām mayi gate rāmaḥ praṇihaniṣyati
prāṇānām apaṇiṣṭā ayam rāvaṇaḥ tvām iha ānayan
adevīt bandhu bhogānām
prādevīt ātma saṃpadam
śata kṛtvas tava ekasyāḥ smarati ahnaḥ raghūttamaḥ

original: Bhk_8.123-1 tavopaśāyikā yāvad rākṣasyaś cetayanti na,

analyzed: vaidehīm dṛṣṭavān karma kṛtvā anyaiḥ api duṣkaram

original: Bhk_8.129-1 rākṣasendrasya saṃrakṣyaṃ mayā lavyamidaṃ vanam,“

analyzed: iti saṃcitya sadṛśam nandanasya abhavak kapiḥ
rāghavābhyām śivam
dūtaḥ tayoḥ aham iti bruvan
hitaḥ bhanajmi rāmasya
kaḥ kim brūte atra rākṣasaḥ

original: Bhk_8.131-1 vilulita-puṣpa-reṇu-kapiśaṃ praśānta-kalikā-palāśa-kusumaṃ kusuma-nipāta-vicitra-vasudhaṃ sa-śabda-nipatad drumotka-śakunam
analyzed: vilulita puṣpa reṇu kapiśam praśānta kalikā palāśa kusumam kusuma nipāta vicitra vasudham sa śabda nipatat druma utka śakunam

original: Bhk_8.131-2 śakuna-nināda-nādi-kakub vilola-vipalāyamāna-hariṇaṃ hariṇa-vilocanā'dhivasatiṃ babhañja pavanā''tmajo ripu-vanam.
analyzed: śakuna nināda nādi kakubh vilola vipalāyamāna hariṇam hariṇa vilocana adhivasatim babhañja pavana ātmajaḥ ripu vanam
bhk
dru bhaṅga dhvani saṃvignāḥ kuvat pakṣi kulāḥ

vināśāya māruteḥ krodha mūrcchitaḥ

original: Bhk_9.5-1 dadhvāna megha-vad bhīmamādāya parighaṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: dadhvāna megha vat bhīmam ādāya parigham kapiḥ

original: Bhk_9.5-2 nedur dīptāyudhās te'pi taḍitvanta ivā'mbudāḥ.
analyzed: neduḥ dīpta āyudhāḥ te api taḍitvantaḥ iva a mbudāḥ
kapinā ambhodhi dhīreṇa samagaṃsata rākṣasāḥ
varṣāsu uddhata toya oghāḥ samudreṇa iva sindhavaḥ

tasthau toraṇam āruhya
pūrvam na prajahāra saḥ
akṣāriṣuḥ śara ambhāṃsi tasmin rakṣaḥ payodharāḥ
na ca ā a hvā alīn
na ca avrājīt trāsam kapi mahīdharaḥ
avādīt tiṣṭhata iti uccais
prādevīt parigham kapiḥ

original: Bhk_9.9-2 tathā, yathā raṇe prāṇān bahūnāmagrahīd dviṣām.
analyzed: tathā yathā raṇe prāṇān bahūnām agrahīt dviṣām
vraṇaiḥ avamiṣuḥ raktam
dehaiḥ prāṛnāviṣuḥ bhuvam

original: Bhk_9.10-2 diśaḥ praurṇāviṣuś cā'nye yātudhānā bhavad-bhiyaḥ
analyzed: diśaḥ praurṇāviṣuḥ ca anye yātudhānāḥ bhavat bhiyaḥ
arāsiṣuḥ cyuta utsāhāḥ bhinna dehāḥ priya asavaḥ
kapeḥ atrāsiṣuḥ nādān mṛgāḥ siṃha dhvaneḥ iva
iti sici vṛddhi adhikāraḥ

original: Bhk_9.12-1 māyānāmīśvarās te 'pi śastra-hastā rathaiḥ kapim
analyzed: māyānām īśvarāḥ te api śastra hastāḥ rathaiḥ kapim

original: Bhk_9.12-2 pratyāvavṛtire hantuṃ hantavyā māruteḥ punaḥ
analyzed: pratyāvavṛtire hantum hantavyāḥ māruteḥ punar

original: Bhk_9.13-1 tāṃś cetavyān kṣitau śritvā vānaras toraṇaṃ yutān
analyzed: tān cetavyān kṣitau śritvā vānaraḥ toraṇam yutān
jaghāna ādhūya parigham vijighṛkṣūn samāgatān
saṃjughukṣavaḥ āyūṃṣi tatas pratirurūṣavaḥ
rāvaṇa antikam ājagmuḥ hata śeṣāḥ niśācarāḥ
ekena bahavaḥ śūrāḥ sa āviṣkārāḥ pramatta vat
vaimukhyam cakṛme ti uccais ūcuḥ daśamukha antike
māṃsa upabhoga saṃśūna an udvignān tān avetya saḥ

original: Bhk_9.16-2 udvṛttā-nayano mitrān mantriṇaḥ svān vyasarjayat
analyzed: udvṛtta ānayanaḥ mitrān mantriṇaḥ svān vyasarjayat

original: Bhk_9.17-1 prameditāḥ sa-putrās te su-svāntā bāḍha-vikramāḥ
analyzed: prameditāḥ sa putrāḥ te su svāntāḥ bāḍha vikramāḥ
amliṣṭa nādāḥ niraguḥ phāṇṭa citra astra pāṇayaḥ

original: Bhk_9.18-1 tān dṛṣṭvā 'tidṛḍhān dhṛṣṭān prāptān parivṛḍhā''jñayā
analyzed: tān dṛṣṭvā ati dṛḍhān dhṛṣṭān prāptān parivṛḍha ājñayā

original: Bhk_9.18-2 kaṣṭaṃ vinardataḥ krūrān śastra-ghuṣṭa-karān kapiḥ
analyzed: kaṣṭam vinardataḥ krūrān śastra ghuṣṭa karān kapiḥ
avyarṇaḥ giri kūṭa ābhān abhyarṇān ārdidat drutam
vṛtta śastrān mahā ārambhyān dāntān tridaśaiḥ api

original: Bhk_9.20-2 jaghāna ruṣito ruṣṭāṃs tvaritas tūrṇamāgatān.
analyzed: jaghāna ruṣitaḥ ruṣṭān tvaritaḥ tūrṇam āgatān
teṣām nihanyamānānām saṃghuṣṭaiḥ karṇa bhedibhiḥ
abhūt abhyamita trāsa mā svānta aśeṣa diś jagat
bhaya saṃhṛṣṭa romāṇaḥ tatas te apacita dviṣaḥ
kṣaṇena kṣīṇa vikrāntāḥ kapinā aneṣata kṣayam

original: Bhk_9.23-1 hatvā rakṣāṃsi lavitumakramīn mārutiḥ punaḥ
analyzed: hatvā rakṣāṃsi lavitum akramīt mārutiḥ punar
aśoka vanikām eva nigṛhītā ari śāsanaḥ
āvarītum iva ākāśam varitum
vanam prabhañjana sutaḥ nā adayiṣṭa vināśayan

original: Bhk_9.25-1 variṣīṣṭa śivaṃ kṣipyan maithilyāḥ kalpa-śākhinaḥ,
analyzed: variṣīṣṭa śivam kṣipyan maithilyāḥ kalpa śākhinaḥ

original: Bhk_9.25-2 prāvāriṣuriva kṣoṇīṃ kṣiptā vṛkṣāḥ samantataḥ.
analyzed: prāvāriṣuḥ iva kṣoṇīm kṣiptāḥ vṛkṣāḥ samantataḥ
saṃvuvūrṣuḥ svam ākūtam ājñām vivariṣuḥ drutam
avariṣṭa akṣam akṣamyam kapim hantum daṣa ānanaḥ

original: Bhk_9.27-1 ūce-“saṃvariṣīṣṭhās tvaṃ gaccha śatroḥ parākramam,
analyzed: ūce saṃvariṣīṣṭhāḥ tvam gaccha śatroḥ parākramam

original: Bhk_9.27-2 dhvṛṣīṣṭhā yudhi māyābhiḥ svaritā śatru-sammukham
analyzed: dhvṛṣīṣṭhāḥ yudhi māyābhiḥ svaritā śatru sammukham

original: Bhk_9.28-1 drutaṃ saṃsvariṣīṣṭhās tvaṃ nir-bhayaḥ pradhanottame“
analyzed: drutam saṃsvariṣīṣṭhāḥ tvam nirbhayaḥ pradhana uttame

original: Bhk_9.28-2 sa māyānāmagāt sotā kaper vidhavituṃ dyutim
analyzed: sa māyānām agāt sotā kapeḥ vidhavitum dyutim

original: Bhk_9.29-1 vigāḍhā 'raṃ vanasyā 'sau śatrūṇāṃ gāhitā kapiḥ
analyzed: vigāḍhā aram vanasyā asau śatrūṇām gāhitā kapiḥ
akṣam radhitum ārebhe raddhā laṅkā anivāsinām
niṣkoṣitavyān niṣkoṣṭum prāṇān daśamukha ātmajāt

original: Bhk_9.30-2 ādāya parighaṃ tasthau vanān niṣkuṣita-drumaḥ
analyzed: ādāya parigham tasthau vanāt niṣkuṣita drumaḥ

original: Bhk_9.31-1 eṣṭārameṣitā saṃkhye soḍhāraṃ sahitā bhṛśam
analyzed: eṣṭāram eṣitā saṃkhye soḍhāram sahitā bhṛśam

original: Bhk_9.31-2 reṣṭāraṃ reṣitaṃ vyāsyad roṣṭā 'kṣaḥ śastra-saṃhatīḥ
analyzed: reṣṭāram reṣitam vyāsyat roṣṭā akṣaḥ śastra saṃhatīḥ

original: Bhk_9.32-1 śastrair dideviṣuṃ saṃkhye dudyūṣuḥ parighaṃ kapiḥ
analyzed: śastraiḥ dideviṣum saṃkhye dudyūṣuḥ parigham kapiḥ
ardidhiṣuḥ yaśaḥ kīrtim īrtsum vṛkṣaiḥ atāḍayat

original: Bhk_9.33-1 bhūyas taṃ dhipsumāhūya rāja-putraṃ didambhiṣuḥ
analyzed: bhūyas tam dhipsum āhūya rāja putram didambhiṣuḥ

original: Bhk_9.33-2 ahaṃs tataḥ sa mūrcchā-vān saṃśiśrīṣurabhūd dhvajam
analyzed: ahan tatas sa mūrcchāvān saṃśiśrīṣuḥ abhūt dhvajam

original: Bhk_9.34-1 āśvasyā 'kṣaḥ kṣaṇāl lokān bibhrakṣuriva tejasā
analyzed: āśvasya akṣaḥ kṣaṇān lokān bibhrat kṣuḥ iva tejasā
ruṣā bibhrat jiṣu prakhyam kapim bāṇaiḥ avākirat

original: Bhk_9.35-1 saṃyuyūṣuṃ diśo bāṇairakṣaṃ yiyaviṣur drumaiḥ
analyzed: saṃyuyūṣum diśaḥ bāṇaiḥ akṣam yiyaviṣuḥ drumaiḥ

original: Bhk_9.35-2 kapir māyāmivā 'kārṣīd darśayan vikramaṃ raṇe.
analyzed: kapiḥ māyām iva akārṣīt darśayan vikramam raṇe
vānaram śastraiḥ akṣaḥ vididyute
tam prorṇunūṣuḥ upalaiḥ sa vṛkṣaiḥ ābabhau kapiḥ

original: Bhk_9.37-1 svāṃ jijñāpayiṣū śaktiṃ bubhūrṣū nu jaganti kim
analyzed: svām jijñāpayiṣū śaktim bubhūrṣū nu jaganti kim
śastraiḥ iti akṛṣātām tau paśyatām buddhim āhave
māyābhiḥ su ciram kliṣṭvā rākṣasaḥ a kliśita kriyam

original: Bhk_9.38-2 saṃprāpya vānaraṃ bhūmau papāta parighā''hataḥ.
analyzed: saṃprāpya vānaram bhūmau papāta parigha āhataḥ

original: Bhk_9.39-1 pavito 'nuguṇair vātaiḥ śītaiḥ pūtvā payo-nidhau
analyzed: pavitaḥ anuguṇaiḥ vātaiḥ śītaiḥ pūtvā payonidhau

original: Bhk_9.39-2 babhañjā'dhyuṣitaṃ bhuyaḥ kṣudhitvā patribhir vanam
analyzed: babhañja a dhyuṣitam bhuyaḥ kṣudhitvā patribhiḥ vanam
uccais añcita lāṅgūlaḥ śiraḥ añcitvā iva saṃvahan

original: Bhk_9.40-2 dadhad vilubhitaṃ vātaiḥ keśaraṃ vahni-piṅgalam
analyzed: dadhat vilubhitam vātaiḥ keśaram vahni piṅgalam

original: Bhk_9.41-1 jaritveva javenā 'nye nipetus tasya śākhinaḥ,
analyzed: jaritvā iva javena anye nipetuḥ tasya śākhinaḥ
vraścitvā vivaśān anyān balena ā apātayat tarūn
damitvā api ari saṃghātān a śrāntvā kapi keśarī

original: Bhk_9.42-2 vanaṃ cacāra kartiṣyan nartsyanniva niraṅkuśaḥ.
analyzed: vanam cacāra kartiṣyan nartsyan iva niraṅkuśaḥ

original: Bhk_9.43-1 pāraṃ jigamiṣan so 'tha punarāvartsyatāṃ dviṣām
analyzed: pāram jigamiṣan saḥ atha punar āvartsyatām dviṣām
matta dvirada vat reme vane laṅkā nivāsinām
yadi akalpsyat abhiprāyaḥ yoddhum rakṣaḥpateḥ svayam
tam api akartsyam adya aham vadan iti acarat kapiḥ

original: Bhk_9.45-1 “hate tasmin priyaṃ śrutvā kalptā prītiṃ parāṃ prabhuḥ,
analyzed: hate tasmin priyam śrutvā kalptā prītim parām prabhuḥ

original: Bhk_9.45-2 toṣo 'dyaiva ca sītāyāḥ paraś cetasi kalpsyati.“
analyzed: toṣaḥ adyā eva ca sītāyāḥ paraḥ cetasi kalpsyati
āhūya rāvaṇaḥ avocat atha indrajitam antikāt

original: Bhk_9.46-2 “vane matta iva kruddho gajendraḥ pradhaneṣvaṭan
analyzed: vane mattaḥ iva kruddhaḥ gaja indraḥ pradhaneṣu aṭan
yayātha tvam dviṣām antam
bhūyas yātāsi ca asakṛt
śaśaktha jetum tvam devān
māyāḥ sasmartha saṃyati
tvam sasarjitha śastrāṇi
dadraṣṭhāḥ arīn ca duḥsahān
śastraiḥ āditha śastrāṇi tvam eva mahatām api

original: Bhk_9.49-1 sa tvaṃ haniṣyan dur-buddhiṃ kapiṃ vraja mamā ''jñayā,
analyzed: sa tvam haniṣyan durbuddhim kapim vraja
mā naḥ añjīḥ rākṣasīḥ māyāḥ
prastāvīḥ mā na vikramam
mā na sāvīḥ mahā astrāṇi
mā na dhāvīḥ arim raṇe
vānaram mā na saṃyaṃsīḥ
vraja tūrṇam aśaṅkitaḥ

original: Bhk_9.51-1 anaṃsīc caraṇau tasya mandirādindrajid vrajan,
analyzed: anaṃsīt caraṇau tasya mandirāt indrajit vrajan
avāpya ca āśiṣaḥ tasmāt āyāsīt prītim uttamām

original: Bhk_9.52-1 gate tasminnupāraṃsīt saṃrambhād rakṣasāṃ patiḥ
analyzed: gate tasmin upāraṃsīt saṃrambhāt rakṣasām patiḥ

original: Bhk_9.52-2 indrajid vikramā'bhijño manvāno vānaraṃ jitam.
analyzed: indrajit vikrama abhijñaḥ manvānaḥ vānaram jitam
saṃsismayiṣamāṇaḥ agāt māyām vyañjijiṣuḥ dviṣaḥ

original: Bhk_9.53-2 jagat pipaviṣur vāyuḥ kalpānta iva durdharaḥ
analyzed: jagat pipaviṣuḥ vāyuḥ kalpa ante iva durdharaḥ
tulyaḥ kṛtāntasya viparyaye

original: Bhk_9.54-2 vane cikariṣor vṛkṣān balaṃ jigariṣuḥ kapeḥ
analyzed: vane cikariṣoḥ vṛkṣān balam jigariṣuḥ kapeḥ

original: Bhk_9.55-1 roditi smeva cā ''yāti tasmin pakṣi-gaṇaḥ śucā
analyzed: roditi sma iva ca tasmin pakṣi gaṇaḥ śucā

original: Bhk_9.55-2 mukta-kaṇṭhaṃ hatān vṛkṣān bandhūn bandhorivā ''game
analyzed: mukta kaṇṭham hatān vṛkṣān bandhūn bandhoḥ iva āgame
āśvasīt iva ca ā āyāti tat vega pavana āhatam
vicitra stabaka udbhāsi vanam lulita pallavam
na prāṇiṣi durācāra
māyānām īśiṣe na ca

original: Bhk_9.57-2 neḍiṣe yadi kākutsthaṃ” tamūce vānaro vacaḥ
analyzed: na īḍiṣe yadi kākutstham tam ūce vānaraḥ vacaḥ
iti iṭ adhikāraḥ

original: Bhk_9.58-1 sa-sainyaś chādayan saṃkhye prāvartiṣṭa tamindrijit
analyzed: sa sainyaḥ chādayan saṃkhye prāvartiṣṭa tam indrijit

original: Bhk_9.58-2 śaraiḥ kṣuraprair māyābhiḥ śataśaḥ sarvato muhuḥ
analyzed: śaraiḥ kṣurapraiḥ māyābhiḥ śataśas sarvatas muhur
vānaraḥ kula śaila ābhaḥ prasahyā āyudha śīkaram
rakṣaspāśān yaśaskāmyan tamaḥ kalpān adudruvat
saṃkhye jyotiṣkalpa ūru keśaraḥ
dudhāva niḥ namaskārān rākṣasa indra puraskṛtān
svāminaḥ niṣkrayam gantum āviṣkṛta balaḥ kapiḥ

original: Bhk_9.61-2 rarāja samare śatrūn ghnan duṣ-kṛta-bahiṣ-kṛtaḥ.
analyzed: rarāja samare śatrūn ghnan duṣkṛta bahiṣkṛtaḥ

original: Bhk_9.62-1 catuṣ-kāṣṭhaṃ kṣipan vṛkṣān tiras-kurvannarīn raṇe
analyzed: catuṣkāṣṭham kṣipan vṛkṣān tiraskurvan arīn raṇe
tiraskṛta diś ābhogaḥ dadṛśaḥ bahudhā bhraman
dviṣkurvatām catuṣkurvan abhighātam naraiḥ dviṣām
bahiṣkariṣyan saṃgrāmāt ripūn jvalana piṅgalaḥ
jyotiṣkurvan iva ekaḥ asau āṭīt saṃkhye parārdhya vat
tamara āyuṣkaram prāpa śakra śatruḥ dhanuṣkaraḥ
asyan aruṣkarān bāṇān jyotiṣkara sama dyutiḥ
yaśaskaraḥ yaśaskāmam kapim bāṇaiḥ tāḍayat

original: Bhk_9.66-1 cakārā 'dhas-padaṃ nā 'sau caran viyati mārutiḥ
analyzed: cakāra adhaspadam nā asau caran viyati mārutiḥ
marma   tamaskāṇḍaiḥ vidhyamānaḥ api anekadhā
iti sattva adhikāraḥ

original: Bhk_9.67-1 puruhūta-dviṣo dhūrṣu yuktān yānasya vājinaḥ
analyzed: puruhūta dviṣaḥ dhūrṣu yuktān yānasya vājinaḥ
āyūṃṣi tvakṣu nirbhidya prābhañjaniḥ amocayat
suṣupuḥ te yadā bhūmau
rāvaṇiḥ sārathim tadā
āhartum anyān aśiṣat proṣita trāsa karkaśaḥ
pratuṣṭūṣuḥ punar yuddham āsiṣañjayiṣuḥ bhayam
ātasthau ratham ātmīyān utsisāhayiṣan iva
balāni abhiṣiṣikṣantam tarubhiḥ kapi vāridam

original: Bhk_9.70-2 vijigīṣuḥ punaś cakre vyūhaṃ dur-jayamindrajit.
analyzed: vijigīṣuḥ punar cakre vyūham durjayam indrajit
abhiṣyantaḥ kapim krodhāt abhyaṣiñcan iva ātmanaḥ
saṃprahāra samudbhūtaiḥ raktaiḥ koṣṇaiḥ arus cyutaiḥ
saṃgrāme tān adhiṣṭhāsyan niṣadya pura toraṇam
a viṣīdan avaṣṭabdhān vyaṣṭabhnāt naraviṣvaṇān
viṣahya rākṣasāḥ kruddhāḥ śastra jālam avākiran
yat na vyaṣahata indraḥ api
kapiḥ paryaṣahiṣṭa tat
viṣyandamāna rudhiraḥ rakta visyanda pāṭalān

original: Bhk_9.74-2 viṣkant n parigheṇā 'hannaviskantā kapir dviṣaḥ.
analyzed: viṣkan n parigheṇa ahan a viskantā kapiḥ dviṣaḥ
megha nādaḥ pariskandan pariṣkandantam āśvarim
abadhnāt apariskandam brahma pāśena visphuran
visphuladbhiḥ gṛhītaḥ asau niṣphulaḥ puruṣa aśanaiḥ
viṣkambhitum samarthaḥ api nā acalat brahma gauravāt
kṛṣīḍhvam bhartuḥ ānandam
mā na proḍhvam drutam viyat
vānaram netum iti uccais indrajit prāvadat svakān
gatam aṅguli ṣaṅgam tvām bhīru sthānāt iha āgatam

original: Bhk_9.78-2 khādiṣyāma” iti procur nayanto mārutiṃ dviṣaḥ.
analyzed: khādiṣyāmaḥ iti procuḥ nayantaḥ mārutim dviṣaḥ
agniṣṭoma ādi saṃstheṣu jyotiṣṭoma ādiṣu dvijān
yaḥ arakṣīt
tasya dūtaḥ ayam mānuṣasya iti ca avadan

original: Bhk_9.80-1 “nāsāṃ mātṛ-ṣvaseyyāś ca rāvaṇasya lulāva yaḥ,
analyzed: nāsām mātṛṣvaseyyāḥ ca rāvaṇasya lulāva yaḥ

original: Bhk_9.80-2 mātuḥ svasuś ca tanayān kharā''dīn vijaghāna yaḥ
analyzed: mātuḥ svasuḥ ca tanayān khara ādīn vijaghāna yaḥ

original: Bhk_9.81-1 prāduḥṣanti na saṃtrāsā yasya rakṣaḥ-samāgame,
analyzed: na saṃtrāsāḥ yasya rakṣaḥ samāgame
tasya kṣatriya duḥṣūteḥ ayam praṇidhiḥ āgataḥ

original: Bhk_9.82-1 dṛṣṭvā su-ṣuptaṃ rājendraṃ pāpo 'yaṃ viṣamā'śayaḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā suṣuptam rāja indram pāpaḥ ayam viṣama āśayaḥ
cāra karmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ praviṣṭaḥ pramadā vanam
su pratiṣṇāta sūtrāṇā kapiṣṭhala sama tviṣām

original: Bhk_9.83-2 sthitāṃ vṛtte dvijātīnāṃ rātrāvaikṣata maithilīm
analyzed: sthitām vṛtte dvijātīnām rātrau aikṣata maithilīm
sarva nārī guṇaiḥ praṣṭhām viṣṭara sthām gaviṣṭhirām

original: Bhk_9.84-2 śayānāṃ ku-ṣṭhale tārāṃ divi-ṣṭhāmiva nir-malām
analyzed: śayānām kuṣṭhale tārām diviṣṭhām iva nirmalām

original: Bhk_9.85-1 su-ṣāmnīṃ sarva-tejassu tanvīṃ jyotiṣṭamāṃ śubhām
analyzed: suṣāmnīm sarva tejassu tanvīm jyotiṣṭamām śubhām
niṣṭapantīm iva ātmānam jyotiḥsāt kurvatīm vanam
ullasat kusumām puṇyām hema ratna latām iva
vilocana ambu muñcantīm kurvāṇām
hṛdayasya iva śoka agni saṃtaptasya uttama vratām

original: Bhk_9.88-1 dṛṣṭvā tāmabhanag vṛkṣān dviṣo ghnan parisedhataḥ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tām abhanak vṛkṣān dviṣaḥ ghnan parisedhataḥ

original: Bhk_9.88-2 paritas tān vicikṣepa kruddhaḥ svayamivā 'nilaḥ
analyzed: paritas tān vicikṣepa kruddhaḥ svayam iva anilaḥ
apratistabdha vikrāntam anistabdhaḥ mahā āhave
visoḍhavantam astrāṇi vyatastambhat ghana dhvaniḥ

original: Bhk_9.90-1 te vijñāyā 'bhisoṣyanataṃ raktai rakṣāṃsi sa-vyathāḥ
analyzed: te vijñāyāḥ raktaiḥ rakṣāṃsi sa vyathāḥ
anyaiḥ api āyatam nehuḥ varatrā śṛṅkhalā ādibhiḥ
viṣasāda indrajit buddhvā bandhe bandha antara kriyām
